111.content:
It has been a few days since Orihime had discovert her powers and she was wondering how she could become stronger with them.

While Orihime was pondering this she heard the voice of Lilly, one of her spirits, talking to her."Hey Orihime-chan, If you want to be stronger I can help you with that. It is an easy way and it is VERY effective." Lilly said as she looked at Orihime for an answer as Orihime looked at her with a questionable look.

"How much stronger would I get and is it reallky that easy?"Orihime asked thinking that getting powerful would normally take alot of effort.

"It's not how much, but how manny times."Lilly said as Orihime looked curious and wanting to know more. Lilly picked up on this and continued."You will be an infinite amount of times stronger and your power will just keep growing, GROWING and GROWING by each day. You will be a goddes to all!!! And it will be really easy to accomplish!!!"Lilly said with alot of enthusiasm, getting Orihime all fired up in the process.

"Alright Lilly I want to be that strong, so please tell me how to get so strong." Orihime said excited at getting so immensely powerfull. As she was looking at Lilly who showed Orihime a glowing orb of energy that transferred inside her body giving her a warm feeling."Wow, what was that?"Orihime asked.

"That was all the energy from your other spirrits. They gladly gave up all there power and life energy for you to get stronger. I am the only one left so I can be the spirit of your power to help you keeping it in ballance and to be your guide."Lilly said getting a nod of understanding from Orihime."Now this will only work on you, because of your special energy and the energy from your other spirits will excellerate the process tremendously. Now all you need to do is letting your energy circulate insite your body and fill every atom of your being. You will only have to do this once, because when you succeed it wwill be like an eternal lock and it will always remain there."Lilly finnished and looked at Orihime who closed her eyes and started to fill her body with her energy.

135.title: Reader's Choice

choices: Rukia grows muscles to rival Yoruichi's
Rukia grows breasts to rival Rangiku
1351.content:
The scent of incense wafted through the air, traces of the smoke gleefully danced in the air,attempting to invite Rukia deeper within the almost stereotypical "Mystery shop" she found herself in. She let out a single, slow defeated sigh, she knew this shop in particular was ran by a con-artist, the only true mystery, Rukia thought, is how this place still exists.

Rukia hadn't come here by choice, Orihime had excitedly dragged her in her, bouncing up and down in her almost sickening manner, surely she of all people should recognize all this stuff is a scam. Regardless of her reasoning she couldn't stop the determined wave of orange hair and ditzy movement from sweeping across the store, squealing and bouncing with delight at seemingly every third trinket.

The raven-haired shinigami had to step out of the shop, the incense had become suffocating, giving her a slight headache.
10 minutes later Orihime appeared, with a gleaming gem necklace, a mysterious tub of sweets and significantly poorer.

These are for you said Orihime as she shook the tub in front of Rukia's eyes, interrupting Rukia's attempts at brooding.
Rukia quickly shoved them in her bag, thanking the ditz and giving a thin, fake smile.
"The packaging had bunnies on them and I know how you like them so I thought it might cheer you up a little"
"Oh I took a few sweets too, I hope you don't mind" she said, a wide smile beaming across her face.
The pair locked eyes, Rukia quickly looked away, blushing, she always felt so jealous of Orihime.

Shortly afterward, the pair went their separate ways at the local park, Rukia sat on a bench as she watched Orihime bounce away, before long she found herself staring at Orihime, she watched as her shapely body swayed and jiggled as she moved.
It's not fair, she thought looking at her own body, desperate to find a single curve, anything. She'd love to have a body like Orihime's or Rangiku's or Yoruichi's.

She reached into her bag for one of the sweets Orihime had given her, she held it to the light of the now setting sun, the sweets were like gobstoppers, clear as crystal she could see the sunset through them the sun, like a match, set of a gleaming chain reaction of sparks and scatterings of beautiful light, dancing carelessly within the jawbreaker.

Rukia popped the jawbreaker into her mouth...

152.content: How shall our dear kunoichi grow then?
152.title: Soifon

choices: Give a visit to Yoruichi and show who's in charge now
Go to the shinigami woman association and show the women there how to grow
1521.content:
The clang of weights could be heard throughout the entire headquarters of the 2nd division. Of course, the hallways were completely empty of life. After a recent incident with someone trying to silence the noise of the metal weights being thrown around, and the man coming back out of the headquarters with broken ribs, people decided to give the 2nd division captain some privacy.

A husky voice breathed out in the innermost room, a dim lantern illuminating the source of the voice. Humongous barbells, with weights the size of monster truck tires were violently lifted up into the air and shakily brought down, two feminine and petite hands gripping the bar. Such soft and delicate looking hands.... that were currently crushing the bar with their monstrous grip.

To say that the woman pumping the weight was muscular was an understatement. She was downright hulking. Her girly hands traced up and morphed into bloated and vein riddled forearms, which squeezed against her overswelled biceps, the peaks on each arm quivering with adrenaline and hormonial power. Her shoulders guaranteed that she would be incapable of fitting through any doorway in the sereitei, and her beachball sized pecs would make sure that she couldn't just slide through sideways. She had never been a "full figured" woman, but her pectorals had developed so much veiny muscle that they had taken on a rounded shape, almost like swollen tits of muscle.

Not a single ounce of fat could be found on her mid section, toned to the point of rippling like water, but with muscle in place. Her tight waist fattened out into two obsidian thick legs, ripened through years of abuse and training, each step she took shaking the ground with tremors.

Her soft facial features, with her face being delicately framed by her short and choppy banged hair, was quite an odd sight, being mounted atop of a volcano of muscle that was her neck, her traps pressing firmly against her ears. Her two braids hung down her endless back, the rings at the end bouncing against her hardened and bloated glutes with every movement she made. Her top had been torn into tatters in several areas, more like rags that clinged to her skin for dear life.

Soifon gave another pant as she lifted the weight, groaning as she felt more pain rush through her body. She hadn't stopped her workout ever since the beginning of the week. Originally, she would've taken some rest. But after seeing her rival/mentor walk onto the scene a couple of weeks back....

She remembered it so vividly. Yoruichi wanting to "hang out" with the 2nd division captain..... Soifon didn't have time for that, she had been too busy training. however, she definitely didn't have time to hang out with her once she saw the tanned woman's body.

The woman had been putting on some serious pounds, and had a figure much more befitting of that of a bodybuilder from the human world. And more than likely, she was much more stronger than before thanks to her pumping up like that. Infuriated, Soifon had redoubled her efforts to surpass Yoruichi. She had tried a variety of exercises, but none of them seemed to work.... that is, until she practiced using her "shunko" ability with weight lifting.

The result had been amazing. While she had been in pain for the past 3 days as she pumped iron, she had been growing at a crazy rate. It almost seemed as if each breath she took caused her to grow bigger thanks to the "Shunko" ability.

After a few more reps, Soifon let go of the bar, letting it crash to the earth, and her legs fell to the ground, so that she was on her knees. She looked down at her body, panting.

Slowly, her face shifted into a wild grin. "Yes... YES! Oh yes, this is what I've been talking about! With this type of power, Yoruichi doesn't stand a fricken chance against my might! Look out world-" She yelled, bringing her arms up and flexing the swollen peaks. "-Cause here comes Ms. Muscles!"

Quickly she got up onto her feet, cracks forming in the ground as she bent down, before jumping up, straight through the roof, a laugh ringing through the air as the boards below her broke from the sudden thrust of energy, the now musclebound Soifon flying off into the distance.

What does she do now?
1521.title: Training with her powers so that she can crush ...

choices: Urahara pops in expecting Yoruichi, only to see Soifon there
15211.content:
Yoruichi had been enjoying a nice quiet nap, the buff kunoichi curled up in a futon, purring contently. This was shattered the moment the ceiling also decided to shatter into a rain of splinters, the tanned woman giving a shriek in surprise as she scrambled out of the futon, quickly getting into a fighting stance.

'Well, whatever it is,' She thought confidently to herself. 'with this new body that I've honed, I'll be able to handle........it.....'

The buff woman stopped thinking to herself as the dust cleared, a hulking physique stomping through the clouds and into full view, her muscles twitching and throbbing all over. If it hadn't been for the petite face framed with dark blue hair and choppy bangs, Yoruichi would've never known that she was looking at Soifon right now.

"S-Soifon?!" She croaked out. "Wa... What the hell happened to you?!"

Soifon gave a smirk as she put a hand on each hip, flexing her upper body. "Hnnngghhh... That's Ms. Muscle to you Yoruichi! I've gotten bigger an stronger thanks to some intense training, and these are the efforts reward!"

Her voice sounded much deeper than before as her chest and shoulders inflated outwards, followed by the popping sound of her abdominals crunching and bloating one by one while her lats were pumped up like over-inflated balloons, her arms actually sticking out at an angle now because of her lats. She loomed massively over the now diminutive shinigami, Yoruichi's eyes barely reaching the lowest set of Soifon's abs, each of which was bigger than her adversary's head. Looking up, it was impossible to see her face past her giant, hill-like pecs, every inch of which displayed incredible striations and a multitude of fat, pulsing veins.

Soifon gave a deep laugh, her voice booming like a shockwave as she flexed her bicep, the peak creeping up more... and more.... and more..... and more! soon the peak was a good few feet above her head, the fatty veins writhing around all over her bicep as she stomped the ground. "With this type of power, there is no limit!"

Yoruichi gave a gulp as she saw the radical changed in Soifon's personality. Once someone who was just tough in spirit, now a narcissistic monster stuffed with muscle.

Soifon....
15211.title: Give a visit to Yoruichi and show who's in ...

choices: She is approached by members of the SWA
1522.content:
Soifon hated physicals.

This was a common fact, known by pretty much everyone in the 2nd division, as well as anyone who knew the short captain. Not a big surprise, considering there were many thing that she hated. Urahara Kisuke was at the top of her list. Still, Soifon was not fond of these physicals, because it meant she had to expose herself to whoever was doing said examination. Neither were the medics in the 4th division. They were the ones who had to be in a small room with the agitated captain, after all.

But that wasn't the sole reason. She just didn't like them; simple as that. Soifon believed in living a healthy, challenging life filled with constant exercise. That's why she was very fit, and why the female shinigami didn't see the point in doing these stupid examinations. Alas, even the captains had to be checked up from time to time, per the captain-commander's orders.

"Let's get this over with..." Soifon grumbled in annoyance. She was sat on a bed, eyes scanning the medical equipment inside the small room; everything was neatly stored away and proper. As expected of the 4th division's barracks. "At least it's you this time."

"Ah, well, captain Unohana thought it would be better if I was the one to do your physical. She wasn't, um, really happy with what happened last time."

Considering she'd thrown the previous medic through a wall, creating a massive hole that had needed lots of repairs and the necessary paperwork for hiring carpenters? Yes, perhaps so. But Soifon could have sworn the bastard had been too frisky at the time.

And was it really her fault? Unohana knew of her dislike for physicals and medics, and then the older woman had decided to pick some random guy, instead of vice-captain Isane?

That was just asking for trouble, if you asked her.

"Oh? And why would that be, hmm?" Soifon smirked, crossing her arms over her small bust.

"Y-y-you know why!"

The boy's face flushed red with embarrassment, and she could hold her bemusement no longer; Soifon broke out giggling. Had lady Yoruchi been here, the purple-haired woman would have shed tears after hearing her apprentice tease someone.

But that was just part of his charm. Contrary to popular belief, she wasn't heartless or without emotions. Hell, she was a woman too! Even Soifon could appreciate love and being in a relationship, despite not having had any love for anyone save her idol, and neither having had any relationship whatsoever.

At least, not until recently.

It was strange to imagine; her coming to the 4th division barracks because she had suffered an injury during training, and meeting this young man. Yes, he was unremarkable, plain, shy and weak. Those were not qualities she'd ever thought she would come to appreciate. Yet somehow, this medic had managed to charm her with his kindness, cute behavior, selflessness and willingness to put up with her own stubborn character.

Oh, and he also thought Yoruichi was a badass, without actually lusting after the Flash Goddess. He scored major point in her book for that.

Soifon rolled her eyes, though the smirk remained plastered on her face. "Come now; we've been together for three months at this point. Don't you think it's about time you stop being embarrassed for being my boyfriend.

Hanataro Yamada, the shy and kind seventh seat of his division, smiled wryly. "I suppose... It's just, I'm still surprised you decided to go out with me."

"Tch. Typical Hanataro behavior." The kunoichi shook her head. It really was typical of him to talk like that. "Just accept it already. Speaking of which, I've accepted my fate, so could we get this physical started?"

"Sure thing. Just give me a moment to get my stuff."

They spent the next fifteen minutes conversing with each other while Hanataro went through each step of the physical. For someone who was not that confident, Soifon admired his medical knowledge and drive. She understood why he'd been given a seat inside his division.

Soifon welcomed the distraction. Truth be told, she'd been agitated as of late. Not because of the oaf that was her vice-captain, nor having to work together with irritating colleagues, but rather her own shortcomings.

It all came down to her relationship with Yoruichi. Ever since her role model had left her without even a single goodbye, Soifon had trained hard to become stronger, more powerful. She had put her body through hell in order to get past her limits. To become faster than ever.

Because she wanted to surpass Yoruichi.

And while Soifon was arguably one of the strongest shinigami in the Soul Society, there was still that nagging doubt that it was not enough; Yoruichi was still better. Now, she did admire her mentor a lot, and some of her fantasies about the dark-skinned beauty were... particularly exciting, so to speak. However, that didn't wash away the years of anger, resentment and frustration.

More than once did she imagine herself growing stronger than Yoruichi, putting the woman in her place -- at Soifon's feet. These dark desires were ever present inside the diminutive captain. But she didn't act on them. Not when there was no way she could fulfill them.

"Right, that should be all." Hanataro announced after a while, breaking her out of her thoughts. "I'll write a few more things down, but you're in great shape -- like always. Captain Unohana will be pleased."

"Alright then."

Soifon nodded and put the upper part of her robe back on. She smirked as she noticed her boyfriend eye her toned arms, watching the shape of her small biceps. Being so close to him, she was more than aware of his love for muscular girls.

"See something you like?" She teased him once more. Not that his embarrassed reaction would ever get tiresome. "Maybe you should join me for my next workout? It'd be nice to put on some more muscle, and you could use some too."

"I usually work out with Ikaku-san, but that would be great! Though I'm not sure if I can find the time. Captain Unohana has tasked me with a project, which is very time-consuming." Hanataro rubbed the back his head awkwardly.

Soifon's curiosity was piqued. "What kind of project? I don't recall her ever mentioning this."

"Well, it's supposed to be a secret, because she doesn't want captain Kurotsuchi to hear about this. The captain doesn't like him interfering." He shrugged. Understandable, since even she knew of the rivalry between the two fellow officers. Mayuri was fond of hoarding all development projects. "We're creating a new mod soul candy, but it functions as a power booster. Kind of like the energy pills our division has. Only this time, the candy is supposed to make a person stronger. Should be valuable for in combat."

That was... perfect! Soifon couldn't believe what she was hearing! A mod soul candy that gave the user a power boost was just the thing she needed to beat Yoruichi.

"What kind of boost are we talking about?" She asked in a nonchalant manner; just to mask her curiosity.

Hanataro put down his clipboard, trying to recall the details. "For starters, it increases your spiritual energy levels. We don't know how much, since it depends on who consumes the candy, but enough to make a big difference. Then there's the increase in physical strength. Yeah, it sounds a bit weird, but the candy somehow forces the muscles to tear themselves down and then build up again, yet stronger than before."

"Such a supplement would revolutionize our way of fighting Hollows!" Soifon's eyes widened.

To think that such a thing was possible. Many scientists -- Urahara and Kurotsuchi among them -- had attempted to increase a shinigami's potential through various means, though not without failure.

"That's what captain Unohana thinks. Our tests have been fruitful so far. Both the captain and vice-captain Isane have tried the candies themselves, and they've seen an increase in muscle mass." He shifted uncomfortably in his seat under Soifon's stare.

Knowing his preferences in women, it was hard not to notice how excited he sounded when describing their condition. Still, Soifon didn't really mind. As long as he looked only, and didn't cheat on her.

"So, Hanataro, is there any chance you have some of those candies left?" She lowered her eyelids slightly, mimicking vice-captain Matsumoto. Funny how she'd dismissed the woman's seduction techniques before, yet found use for them now. "I wouldn't mind trying them out."

"Ah, I don't know, Soifon. Captain Unohana was very strict when she said I couldn't tell anyone."

"I'm sure she wouldn't mind. As a captain, I understand the need for secrecy. It's just that the project would go smoother if another figure of authority approved of it." Soifon smirked as she saw the doubt form in his eyes. Smelling blood in the water, she went in for the kill. "Is it because you wouldn't like it if I get a bit more muscular?"

That was enough to win him over. "Well, I guess it wouldn't hurt..."

The short medic walked over to a nearby cabinet, opened one of the drawers and retrieved a small bottle. Soifon eagerly accepted the small container. She peered inside and saw multiple pills, colored a dark blue.

"So, I take one of these? Are the results instantaneous?"

"Yes, but these are the newest version." Hanataro explained. "Captain Unohana and Isane took the previous ones, which required physical effort. These candies, on the other hand, grant instant growth. But I advise you to take only one. We don't know what happens if you take more than one at a time."

"Thank you for the gift then." Soifon grinned, before leaning in to place a quick kiss on his cheek. The dark-haired boy smiled in response. "I'll be back soon. First, I have a meeting with lady Yoruichi..."
1522.title: Mod soul candy that pumps you up

choices: Soifon wants power, thus she takes more
15221.content:
Once more in the secured confines of her personal dojo, Soifon opened the bottle of mod soul candies, regarding the blue jawbreakers with a healthy dose of curiosity. So strange to think that these little things were going to help her beat Yoruichi. Still, she wasn't going to complain; anything that could help her win would be appreciated.

"Hanataro warned me to take only one candy." The female captain muttered under her breath.

She was conflicted, not knowing whether to follow his advice or take more than one. Sure, she was no medical expert, nor had she any idea of the true capabilities of the strength-enhancing supplement, but the urge to absolutely dominate her former teacher was strong.

Soifon could already imagine herself; a powerful, unbeatable woman who was far more superior than the famous Flash Goddess. One that was stronger, faster and more durable.

These pills could grant that image -- help fulfill her dream!

Her small hand clenched the bottle harder. What was the harm of taking more than one? Didn't she want power? To be both respected and feared by Yoruichi? Hanataro's warning echoed inside her head.

However, she didn't have much time. Yoruichi would be training in her secret underground cave, and the dark-skinned woman would eventually leave. This was her best opportunity to confront and fight her.

As Soifon gazed down upon the candies, she made her choice.
15221.title: Soifon goes after her idol

choices: Time to face her former mentor
Soifon wants to test this new body
152212.content:
"Screw it. If I want to defeat Yoruchi, I need every boost available." Soifon eventually decided; face set in a determined glare.

Someone of Yoruichi's caliber was no joke. If there was one person who understood this better than anyone else, then it was her. That woman was like a tidal wave of strength.

Soifon discarded her captain's coat, leaving her in the traditional uniform of the commander-in-chief of the Onmitsukidō. The outfit did not have sleeves, nor did it cover her back. Instead, she wore long black arm bands. Best to keep the coat safe; otherwise the captain-commander might throw another fit.

A quick check to see if she was alone later, and Soifon was ready to try the soul mod candies. Gray eyes narrowed as she focused her determination on becoming better. Better than she was now. Better than Yoruichi.

Soifon nodded to herself. "All or nothing. I've never allowed myself to be anything less than I can be, and I'll be damned if i betray my principles now."

Ignoring the advice Hanataro had given her earlier, she grabbed three candies and ate them all. The taste was -- funnily enough -- strawberry and quite pleasant. But Soifon wasn't interested in treats; only the results.

A sudden feeling of intense heat, so hot it almost set her insides aflame, washed over her, stealing away her breath and movement. Soifon gritted her teeth and balled her fists in an attempt to resist the intensity of it all. This sensation... it was unlike anything she'd ever experienced before! As if her reiatsu reserves had increased at least threefold!

"This rush of power... Yes! Give me what I want!" Soifon growled, narrowing her eyes in concentration.

It started slow, but Soifon could see her muscles spamsing and contracting, tearing themselves down and immediately repairing themselves. A painful process to say the least, but as quickly as it came, the pain went partially way; now mixed with pure pleasure.

The diminutive captain gasped as her entire body started to swell. Veins crawled over her skin like angry snakes, and the muscles they fed with nutrients began to grow. Soifon tilted her head backwards, eyes wide open and aware, while her breathing sped up.

Toned arms, laced with lean and corded muscle after years of training, quickly packed on more mass. Her triceps expanded outwards and took on the shape of cables, while her biceps grew in tandem. Skin was stretched out as the round orbs seemingly rose upwards like two mighty mountains, creating crevices and ravines in the form of striations while doing so. Soifon clenched her fists hard, feeling the growth affect her forearms equally. They became thicker, wider. The veins standing out more in order to keep up with the demand of nutrients.

Soifon's arms were turning into sledgehammers in a matter of seconds, and yet the growth was not limited to simply that. Those arms were connected to shoulders that were more akin to boulders right now, with such amazing definition; they almost resembled peeled onions. Just layers upon layers of muscle. They made her neck thicker, though this was only accomplished due to her traps, which rose like bread in the oven.

In fact, her entire back was being build up with sturdy muscle fibers, creating a network of powerful tendons. Soifon let out a guttural groan as the muscles in her back creaked and tensed. Mighty lats spread out even further, and the V-shape of her back became sharper than ever.

"Yes! This is what true power feels like!" Soifon laughed out loud. The dark-haired captain loved every second of the transformation,relishing in the pleasurable sensation it provided. Never before had she felt so alive as she did at the moment. "Grow even bigger. More mass. More strength. More muscle!"

What had once been an admittedly unimpressive chest was now not only incredibly wide, due to the meaty pectorals that kept expanding, but also carrying an impressive pair of breasts, which did not slow down in their quest for growth. Soifon's pecs jutted outwards like thick, armored plates. This alone gave her a nice cleavage -- solely made of muscle of course -- yet combined with her boobs, which were now at least on Matsumoto's level, her chest was superb!

Further down below, the shinigami captain's legs packed on some serious beef. Her thighs were positively bloated with muscle, and both her hamstrings and quads gained such definition, it almost looked as if a master sculptor had made them. The lumps and curves of her leg muscles were sharp, yet at the same time smooth. Naturally, her glutes expanded as well, giving Soifon a muscular booty that was perfection incarnate. Last but not least, her calves were swollen and hard, gaining not only size but also magnificent definition.

She groaned through clenched teeth, feeling the growth settle down. Still, that didn't keep her from riding the waves of pleasure and pain that kept on hitting her. With one final roar, she flexed her muscles, causing them to experience one final burst of growth, before it ended.

Soifon was a panting mess. Her breathing was fast and sweat ran down the crevices of her new muscles, but that did not deter her from smiling widely.

"This... this is everything I could have hoped for. My body has become massive and powerful!" The excitement she felt was palpable. Soifon smirked, looking down at her thick arms. "Everything is so big..."

As if to demonstrate her point, the captain flexed one of her biceps, forcing the mound of muscle to swell to its full size. Within seconds it reached an astonishing record of 22 inches; all solid and hard. The veins under her skin seemed to pulsate in response, and even her forearm bulged larger. Soifon grinned as she inspected the sheer definition of her bicep, liking how there was a noticeable split on top.

And damn; she felt great! Soifon's hands roamed over her gargantuan thighs, groping the firm lumps and bumps. Just one thigh alone was as wide as a person's waist! She couldn't help but moan as her fingers tried to press down on the solid mass, knowing her muscles would not give in.

Soifon laughed out loud, voice slightly deeper but still feminine, and put her fists on her hips. She was one hell of an intimidating sight!

"Watch out, Yoruichi." She smiled fiendishly, flexing her massive biceps. "You won't know what you're in for!"
152212.title: Soifon wants power, thus she takes more

155.title: More ladies!

choices: She goes to Ichigo's home and waits for him there
1551.content:
Nel smiled happily as she waited at Urahara’s shop. She decided to live in the human world so she could see Ichigo more. She was currently waiting for the substitute Shinigami and Urahara who were discussing something.

Naturally Nel eventually got bored and looked around the building to do something. She found an iron door and opened it. Inside there was a laboratory with many machines. Numerous lights flickered and peaked Nel’s curiosity. She saw a package of candies lying on the table and dashed for it.
She opened the package and took a red colored candy. She quickly ate it and was overwhelmed with the delicious strawberry flavor that she closed her eyes. It tasted so good she didn’t notice the effects of the candy.

Unbeknownst to Nel she began to grow taller. She was already tall, 5’9 inches, but now she was easily 6’6 already. Her body became more toned as well. A clear 6 pack formed. Her biceps grew bigger, more packed with pure muscle. The sleeves of her white shirt she wore began to tear under the pressure of the large biceps.
Her legs became thicker. The tight jeans she wore instantly lost the fight and were shredded revealing her dense legs. Her claves had grown too. Her back widened and her neck was now sturdy. Her pectorals widened as well causing her already ample chest to appear larger. Speaking about her assets they also grew larger and fuller. Her luscious breasts caused the shirt to strain more and eventually they barely held them back.

Nel sighed contently. The taste of the candy was delicious. She opened her eyes and was hit with confusion. The room looked slightly smaller. She looked down and gasped at her huge form. She ran a hand over her exposed abs. They felt incredible dense and hard. She proceeded to feel her large biceps. She flexed and felt her sleeves completely rip. She then ran her hands over her legs. They were filled to the brim with power. She touched her majestic breasts as it was impossible to fit them in one hand.

She grinned and realized it was because of the candy she just ate. A devious idea made its way into her head.
1551.title: Nel

choices: Someone comes in the room and interrupts them
Nel decides to take another candy
15511.content:

“I suppose it’s super easy now with this body.” She said to herself.

He thought about the teal haired beauty that lived with him. He wanted to confess his feelings for Nel but couldn’t find the courage. Once upstairs he felt his jaw drop when he entered his room.

The defined 6 pack that could break a fist if anyone punched it. The legs that could squeeze the life out of someone.

Ichigo tried to move it with one arm but felt like trying to push a wall. Nel kept on smiling at the sight. “So it’s you.” She said with a grin.
